name: Sony PlayStation VR2
description: Premium VR for PlayStation 5 with 4K HDR OLED displays. Features eye tracking, haptic feedback in headset, and 3D audio. The best way to play VR games on console.

reviews.review_text: OLED displays are gorgeous. Best looking VR games.
Haptic feedback in headset is innovative.
Needs more exclusive games but hardware is great.
